name: The Exiled Princess - Team #15
description:
The Exiled Princess

Princess Samara was exiled from her kingdom by her Father King Lewis to protect her from his enemies. After 20 years, the enemies finally caught up to King Lewis and killed him. It is time for Samara to take up the big responsibility and use her power to save her kingdom. 

The three different levels of the game take Princess Samara to various locations within her home kingdom where she has to fight the demons sent by her father's enemies. 

Instructions

Arrow keys to move right and left and space for jump. Alternate keys

A - Left

D- right
